overview_of_class: This course is the third and final course in the General Chemistry sequence. Topics covered in the course include the following: chemical equilibrium; equilibria in aqueous solution; chemical kinetics; electrochemistry and oxidation-reduction reactions; transition metals and special topics.
name: General Physical Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 103-0-23 General Physical Chemistry
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 123-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is the third and final course in the General Chemistry sequence. Topics covered in the course include the following: chemical equilibrium; equilibria in aqueous solution; chemical kinetics; electrochemistry and oxidation-reduction reactions; transition metals and special topics.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 102-0 and Chemistry 122-0

Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 123-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. General Chemistry, Petrucci et al., 11th Edition, Pearson ($338 new; $253.65 used)***
(10th Edition acceptable but content will not match perfectly)

2. Scientific calculator (any model)

***Price as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 4/4/17. Price offered by other vendors may be lower.

subject: CHEM
